translation: Tang translation of the Sanskrit text translated by imperial edict
Dhāraṇī of the Great Wheel- vajra Dhāraṇī One

source_sentence: 訥謨薩怛唎耶　地毘迦喃　怛他揭多喃　唵毘囉　時毘囉時　摩訶斫迦囉　跋闍唎薩多薩多娑囉帝娑囉帝　怛唎曳怛唎曳毘陀末儞　三槃若儞　怛囉末底悉陀阿揭唎怛炎　娑婆訶誦此陀羅尼三七遍即當入一切漫荼羅(壇也)所作皆成(誦呪。
translation: When he recites this dhāraṇī three or seven times, he'll enter all the works of the maṇḍala (altar), which are all accomplished (by chanting a mantra.
There's the body mudrā and hand mudrā.
He makes the mudrā and recites the dhāraṇī, which are easy to accomplish.
If someone hasn't yet entered the altar.
They won't be allowed to do it in vain.
Now, I'll cause you to recite this dhāraṇī.

source_sentence: 即當入壇作印行不成盜法也)。
translation: That's when he enters the altar to make a seal and doesn't practice stealing.)
Two Dhāraṇī of the Sunlight Bodhisattva

source_sentence: 南謨勃陀瞿(上聲)那(上聲)迷　南摩達摩　莫訶南謨僧伽多也泥底(丁以切)哩部卑薩(僧沒切)咄(登沒反)擔(平聲)納摩(誦此呪滅一切障亦能辟魔及除天災。
translation: Namobuddha (上聲)那(上聲)迷南摩達摩 莫訶南僧伽多也泥底(丁以切)哩部卑薩(僧沒切)咄(登沒反)擔(平聲)納摩( Recite this dhāraṇī to extinguish all hindrances, and it will also remove Māra and the heavenly calamities
Furthermore, if he recites it once and pays homage to the Buddha with one obeisance.

source_sentence: 如此日別三時誦呪禮佛。
translation: Thus, he recites the dhāraṇī at three separate times each day to venerate the Buddha.

source_sentence: 未來當得二相端正具足果報)。
translation: In the future, he'll attain the fruit of having two characteristics that are correct and complete.)

source_sentence: 唵(上)摩利支曳　薩婆薩多婆頞陀利沙利娑(上聲)婆(去聲)訶誦此呪極護人身。
translation: Om (上)摩利支曳 薩婆薩多婆陀利沙利娑(上聲)婆(去聲)訶誦此呪極護人身。

source_sentence: 當日別三時各誦一百八遍。
translation: On that day, he recites it one hundred and eight times at each of the three separate times.
